name: (CAT006LP) VEIN - TOFU SANDWICH (12")
description:
Vein - Tofu Sandwich Release Date - Oct 31, 2013 Label - The Horse We Want To Hang Format - 12" Record CAT No. - 006LP Website - www.thwwth.com Vein's tragic long-form piece in rough, full of stealthily hypnotic pedal drones, infusing outsider sounds with hints of doom through passed out distorted environments, applying melancholic reefs in between. Recorded in an intensely aphotic single-session at the Cecil Hotel in room 1206 during the Winter Solstice in 2012 the not willing to belong 'Tofu Sandwich' just leaves the corpsepaint behind. Tracklisting 12": Side I Emptiness (Nothing On This Side) Side II Prelude (Nature Writings) 1:10 Act I (Alcott House) 5:14 Act II (Carnivorous Prediction) 3:05 Act III (Tree-Eating Man) 4:49 Act IV (Fruitlands' Torture Chamber) 2:47 Finale (Eggplant Genocide) 2:55

Vein - Prelude (Nature Writings) from THWWTH on Vimeo.

name: (CAT009) VEIN'S TRANSFIGURATION (POSTERS)
description:
"Vein's Transfiguration"

Six large monochrome scenes on Vein's "transfiguration" 
by David R. Cornejo, printed with large format plotter 
printer meant for CAD & GIS.
hand numbered and signed, including an ink-stamped single format.

23" x 35"
(60 x 90 cm)

name: (CAT010MTC) PLAYTONTO - HALFWAY (MTC)
description: Mini-Album Exclusively Released for: "Cassette Store Day" Out September 7th, 2013 PlayTonto - Halfway Release Date - Sep 7, 2013 Label - The Horse We Want To Hang Format - Magnetic Tape Cassette CAT No. - 010MTC Website - www.thwwth.com A Cassette Store Day refresh with four previously unreleased lo-fi cuts of Play Tonto's unorthodox language, material laden with droggy ambient & dada beat machines. "Play Tonto's Halfway" is a neopagan, noisy transmission with partially abstract vocals, providing gazed harmonies, a slow-muddy Krautrock rooted psych-theme "Silver Ship" and a couple of other wicked tv ambient tricks. Tracklisting: I - Halfway / Yard Sale 4:45 II - Silver Ship / Theater 4:54 Preview: Video:

name: (CAT007) THE KIDS SHOULD TAKE MORE ACID (ZINE)
description: "The Kids Should Take More Acid" Full-page publication featuring multimedia clippings, hand drawings and fragmented memories, cast in these quirky collages mainly inspired by enhanced mind-altering experiences by David R. Cornejo. 6.8 x 10.3 In. (16.2 x 25.9 cm) 12 Pages + Covers Laser Printed & Hand Bounded (first ten come with special blotter) *PREVIEW

name: THRU THE WALL (COAT RACK) PLAIN
description:
Thru the wall can function mainly as a coat rack but can hold anything up 
to 3.32 pounds (1.5 kg), and goes fixed to the wall with one single nail.

Since 2006 this figure has been made with artisanal production methods
by skilled craftsmen and their hands to support the work of people.

Resin figure 
3"x5.4"

Eple Co., Ltd. (c) All Rights Reserved 2006-2013

name: (CAT012MTC) DAVID R. CORNEJO - THE MORPHINE SESSIONS VOLUME ONE (MTC)
description: David R. Cornejo - The Morphine Sessions Volumen One Release Date - May/18/2012 Label - The Horse We Want To Hang Format - Magnetic Tape (Cassette) CAT No. - 012MTC Website - www.thwwth.com A walk in through dark almost silenced ambient textures with gradually emerging liturgic presences and jarring scenes found in tracks like "Shadows In The Stairs" and "Waking (12)" "The Morphine Sessions Volumen One" is one of Cornejo's first room exiled ambient compositions previously released digitally through F.I.N. (2010), now available in magnetic tape cassette including three unreleased pieces. Tracklisting: A1 - Pentagram's White Room A2 - Important For A Chaser A3 - Shadows On The Stairs A4 - Memoir 072 (Excerpt One Of Six) A5 - Intermission A6 - Morphine A7 - Presence B1 - Sleep Is Easy B2 - Spell B3 - The Green Bottle B4 - The Dark Messenger B5 - Dim Lights B6 - 4:00 A.M. B7 - Waking (12) Buy Digital:

name: (CAT004EP) NINA RYSER - SEPTEMBER (7")
description: Nina Ryser - September Release Date - Dec/12/2012 Label - The Horse We Want To Hang Format - 7" record CAT No. - 004EP Website - www.thwwth.com Debut EP on The Horse We Want To Hang music imprint by Nina Ryser, comes in 7" featuring 8 pieces from her upcoming album "Strange Place" (audio cassette ©THWWTH). "September" is a quiet-loud dive into Nina's diverse compositions going through dream folk lone singing like "Back In Nam", gazing mellow pieces such as "Everything We've Ever Been Taught" and calmly demented homely appeal riff tunes as "The Same Wave". Tracklisting 7": A1 - September A2 - Strange Place A3 - Everything We've Ever Been Taught A4 - Lullaby To The Pines B1 - Back In Nam B2 - Ballad Of A Family Gathering B3 - The Same Wave B4 - Pavement Lickers Buy Digital:

name: (CAT008CD-R) PLAY TONTO - NO EARTH / NEW PLANETS (CD-R)
description: Play Tonto - No Earth / New Planets Release Date - Oct/24/2012 Label - The Horse We Want To Hang Format - CD-R CAT No. - 008CD-R Website - www.thwwth.com 69 minutes of pure analog spaced out programing 1990s rooted house inspired. #303 #808 #909 01 - Pagan Cosmology 02 - Lemuria 03 - Metallic Mountains 04 - The Galactic Center 05 - Holography 06 - Isis-Urania 07 - Root Races 08 - The Octavo 09 - Terrestrial 10 - No Earth 11 - Syzygy 12 - Username 13 - Shapeshifter Shoplifter 14 - Multidimensional Eye 15 - New Planets 16 - Time 17 - Gravitational Constant 18 - Proxima Centauri 19 - Expedition 20 - Problems 21 - Remote Viewing 22 - Morning Star 23 - Parsons Crater *PREVIEW:

name: (CAT003EP) PLAY TONTO - THERE IS ONLY TWO OF US NOW (7")
description:
Play Tonto - There Is Only Two Of Us Now 
Release Date - May/17/2012 
Label - The Horse We Want To Hang 
Format - 7" record 
CAT No. - 003EP 
Website - www.thwwth.com


The Horse We Want To Hang's first vinyl release.

7" Single contains four tracks taken from
the album "The City Of The Future" by David R. Cornejo
under the pseudonym Play Tonto previously released on audio
cassette

Play Tonto delivers his interpretation of Ciudad Juárez'
(Northern Mexico) bizarre night life, a mix of drugs, violence and desolation through mechanical beats, exploring the field of cold wave electronics, synth pop, and lo-fi with a hint of an ethereal, ghostlike feeling to it.

Tracklisting 7":
A1 - There Is Only Two Of Us Now
A2 - Occult Chemistry
B1 - Druglord
B2 - Uninvited Guest

*PREVIEW 7"
<iframe width="100%" height="450" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="http://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Fplaylists%2F1899869&show_artwork=true"></iframe>

name: (CAT003EP) PLAY TONTO - THERE IS ONLY TWO OF US NOW (ZINE + 7")
description: Play Tonto - There Is Only Two Of Us Now 7" Record + Zine (Ltd 100) Release Date - May/17/2012 Label - The Horse We Want To Hang Format - 7" Record + Zine (Ltd 100) CAT No. - 003EP+ Website - www.thwwth.com The Horse We Want To Hang's first vinyl release. 7" Single contains four tracks taken from the album "The City Of The Future" by David R. Cornejo under the pseudonym Play Tonto previously released on audio cassette Play Tonto delivers his interpretation of Ciudad Juárez' (Northern Mexico) bizarre night life, a mix of drugs, violence and desolation through mechanical beats, exploring the field of cold wave electronics, synth pop, and lo-fi with a hint of an ethereal, ghostlike feeling to it. Special limited edition of 100 copies, includes a numbered Zine (20 Pages 19.5x25.5cm) featuring monochromatic visual elements from the artist's exhibition 'Chased: An Exercise to Simulate a Synesthetic Experience'. Each Zine has a unique cover detail, hand packaged in a silk screened self seal poly bag. Tracklisting 7": A1 - There Is Only Two Of Us Now A2 - Occult Chemistry B1 - Druglord B2 - Uninvited Guest *PREVIEW 7" *PREVIEW ZINE
